topic: stock futures are little changed ahead of jobs report, potential tariff ruling: live updates

text: Investors are waiting for the latest jobs report and a potential tariff ruling that could impact the markets.

The unemployment rate is expected to hold steady at around 4 percent.

Stock futures are little changed ahead of the jobs report and tariff ruling.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average is seeing minimal gains.
The S&P 500 is also seeing minimal gains.

The jobs report and tariff ruling could impact investor sentiment.
The markets may react significantly to the jobs report and tariff ruling.
